Shoes.name: Shoes
Shoes.description: A category for various types of shoes.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The brand of the shoes.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The target gender for the shoes.

attributes.name: Model name
attributes.description: The specific model name of the shoes.

attributes.name: Shoe type
attributes.description: The type or style of the shoes.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the shoes.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The size of the shoes.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin
Vitamin.description: A category of products that provide essential nutrients to support overall health and well-being.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The specific brand or manufacturer of the vitamin product.

attributes.name: Supplement type
attributes.description: The type of supplement, such as capsules, tablets, or gummies.

attributes.name: Dosage
attributes.description: The recommended amount of the vitamin to be taken per serving.

attributes.name: Health benefit
attributes.description: The specific health benefits that the vitamin provides, such as immune support or bone health.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The total amount of the vitamin product in each package.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: The physical form of the vitamin, such as liquid, powder, or chewable.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The number of units or servings included in each package.

Coffee.description: A category for all types of coffee products.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The brand of the coffee product.

attributes.name: Flavor
attributes.description: The flavor of the coffee product.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: The form in which the coffee product is available.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The net content or weight of the coffee product.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The size of the pack in which the coffee product is sold.

attributes.name: Roast type
attributes.description: The type of roast of the coffee product.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The brand of the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: The specialty feature of the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Age
attributes.description: The recommended age group for the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The pack size of the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Power source
attributes.description: The power source of the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Operation mode
attributes.description: The operation mode of the toothbrush.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the toothbrush.

Breakfast Cereal.name: Breakfast Cereal
Breakfast Cereal.description: A category of food products typically consumed as a breakfast meal.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The name of the brand associated with the cereal product.

attributes.name: Sub brand
attributes.description: The name of the sub brand associated with the cereal product.

attributes.name: Flavor
attributes.description: The specific flavor of the cereal product.

attributes.name: Cereal type
attributes.description: The type or variety of cereal product.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The weight or volume of the cereal product.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The number of units or servings in a pack of the cereal product.

attributes.name: Container
attributes.description: The type of packaging or container used for the cereal product.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: Any special features or characteristics of the cereal product.

Sunscreen.name: Sunscreen
Sunscreen.description: Protect your skin from harmful UV rays with our range of sunscreens.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: Choose from top brands for the best sun protection.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: Find sunscreens for sensitive skin, kids, and sports activities.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: Discover sunscreens in various forms like lotions, sprays, and sticks.

attributes.name: Protection level
attributes.description: Get the right level of sun protection with different SPF options.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: Find sunscreens in different sizes to suit your needs.

Conditioner.name: Conditioner
Conditioner.description: Conditioner is a hair care product that helps to moisturize and nourish the hair.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: Brand is the name of the company that produces the conditioner.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: Specialty refers to any unique features or benefits of the conditioner.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: Item form describes the physical form of the conditioner, such as liquid, cream, or spray.

attributes.name: Volume
attributes.description: Volume indicates the quantity or size of the conditioner.

attributes.name: Hair type
attributes.description: Hair type specifies the type of hair that the conditioner is suitable for.

attributes.name: Scent
attributes.description: Scent refers to the fragrance or aroma of the conditioner.

Laundry Detergent.name: Laundry Detergent
Laundry Detergent.description: Laundry detergent is a product used for cleaning clothes.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The brand of the laundry detergent.

attributes.name: Specific uses
attributes.description: The specific uses or purposes of the laundry detergent.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: The form in which the laundry detergent is available.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The net content or volume of the laundry detergent.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The pack size or quantity of the laundry detergent.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: Any special features or characteristics of the laundry detergent.

Safety Mask.name: Safety Mask
Safety Mask.description: Protective masks designed to provide safety and prevent the spread of airborne particles.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The brand or manufacturer of the safety mask.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The amount or volume of the safety mask.

attributes.name: Reusability
attributes.description: Indicates whether the safety mask is reusable or disposable.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for which the safety mask is designed.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used in the construction of the safety mask.

attributes.name: Mask type
attributes.description: The specific type or style of the safety mask.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color or color options available for the safety mask.

Tea.name: Tea
Tea.description: A category of beverages made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant, known for its various flavors and health benefits.

attributes.name: Brand
attributes.description: The specific brand or company that produces the tea.

attributes.name: Flavor
attributes.description: The distinct taste or aroma of the tea.

attributes.name: Item form
attributes.description: The physical form in which the tea is available, such as loose leaves, tea bags, or powdered form.

attributes.name: Net content
attributes.description: The quantity or weight of the tea product.

attributes.name: Pack size
attributes.description: The number of units or servings in a package of tea.

attributes.name: Specialty
attributes.description: Any unique or special characteristics of the tea, such as organic, herbal, or flavored.

attributes.name: Tea variety
attributes.description: The specific type or variety of tea, such as green tea, black tea, or oolong tea.

attributes.name: Country
attributes.description: The country of origin or production of the tea.
